titleStmt.title: Patronus redux, or, Our protectour is return'd safe again an historicall poem : containing the Earl of Calander's departure, his stay in England, and the effects thereof upon the town of Falkirk : congratulating his return : and describing his vertues, with their profits communicated unto the said town / composed by M. L.
titleStmt.author: M. L. (Michael Livingston), 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Michael Livingston. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
